quests.desc: Hey, thanks for coming over to the TextWorld today, there is something I need you to do for me. First thing I need you to do is to venture south. Okay, and then, head west. And then, recover the type E latchkey from the floor of the studio. And then, make an effort to take a trip north. And then, look and see that the type E door inside the cookhouse is unlocked with the type E latchkey. Once you have unlocked the type E door, open the type E door within the cookhouse. Then, travel east. After that, go south. Then, go east. After that, look and see that the dresser within the launderette is closed. That's it!
commands: unlock type E door with type E latchkey
unlock type E door with type E latchkey

infos.name: launderette
infos.desc:
You arrive in a launderette. A normal kind of place.

 Oh, great. Here's a dresser.[if c_0 is open and there is something in the c_0] The dresser contains [a list of things in the c_0]. Does this look like anything mentioned in the instructions?[end if][if c_0 is open and the c_0 contains nothing] The dresser is empty! What a waste of a day![end if] [if c_1 is locked]A locked[else if c_1 is open]An open[otherwise]A closed[end if] typical looking formless chest is right there by you.[if c_1 is open and there is something in the c_1] The formless chest contains [a list of things in the c_1]. You wonder idly who left that here.[end if][if c_1 is open and the c_1 contains nothing] The formless chest is empty! What a waste of a day![end if] You make out a bench. The bench is usual.[if there is something on the s_0] On the bench you see [a list of things on the s_0].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_0] But the thing is empty, unfortunately. Aw, here you were, all excited for there to be things on it![end if]

There is an unguarded exit to the east. There is an unblocked exit to the north. There is an unblocked exit to the west.

infos.name: basement
infos.desc:
You find yourself in a basement. An ordinary kind of place.

 You can see [if c_2 is locked]a locked[else if c_2 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] locker.[if c_2 is open and there is something in the c_2] The locker contains [a list of things in the c_2].[end if][if c_2 is open and the c_2 contains nothing] What a letdown! The locker is empty![end if] You can make out a table. The table is usual.[if there is something on the s_1] On the table you see [a list of things on the s_1].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_1] But the thing is empty, unfortunately. It would have been so cool if there was stuff on the table.[end if]

You need an unblocked exit? You should try going east. There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unguarded. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unblocked. There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unguarded.

infos.name: parlor
infos.desc:
You've just walked into a parlor.



There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unguarded. There is an unblocked exit to the south. There is an unblocked exit to the west.

infos.name: closet
infos.desc:
You find yourself in a closet. An ordinary kind of place.

 You scan the room, seeing a coffer.[if c_3 is open and there is something in the c_3] The coffer contains [a list of things in the c_3].[end if][if c_3 is open and the c_3 contains nothing] What a letdown! The coffer is empty![end if]

 There is [if d_0 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] type E door leading west. There is [if d_1 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] gate leading north. There is an unguarded exit to the east. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unguarded.

infos.name: pantry
infos.desc:
Well, here we are in the pantry.



You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unguarded.

infos.name: kitchen
infos.desc:
You've just walked into a kitchen.

 You make out [if c_4 is locked]a locked[else if c_4 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] cabinet.[if c_4 is open and there is something in the c_4] The cabinet contains [a list of things in the c_4].[end if][if c_4 is open and the c_4 contains nothing] Empty! What kind of nightmare TextWorld is this?[end if]

 There is [if d_1 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] gate leading south. You don't like doors? Why not try going east, that entranceway is unblocked.

infos.name: steam room
infos.desc:
You are in a steam room.

 You see [if c_5 is locked]a locked[else if c_5 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] basket.[if c_5 is open and there is something in the c_5] The basket contains [a list of things in the c_5].[end if][if c_5 is open and the c_5 contains nothing] Empty! What kind of nightmare TextWorld is this?[end if]

There is an unguarded exit to the south. You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unguarded.

infos.name: lounge
infos.desc:
This is going to sound unbelievable, but you've just entered a lounge.



There is an unblocked exit to the east. There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unblocked. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unguarded. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going west.

infos.name: chamber
infos.desc:
You find yourself in a chamber. An ordinary one.

 You make out a type 4 safe.[if c_6 is open and there is something in the c_6] The type 4 safe contains [a list of things in the c_6].[end if][if c_6 is open and the c_6 contains nothing] The type 4 safe is empty! What a waste of a day![end if]

You need an unblocked exit? You should try going north. There is an unblocked exit to the west.

infos.name: shower
infos.desc:
You find yourself in a shower. An usual one. The room seems oddly familiar, as though it were only superficially different from the other rooms in the building.

 You make out a safe. Now why would someone leave that there?[if c_7 is open and there is something in the c_7] The safe contains [a list of things in the c_7].[end if][if c_7 is open and the c_7 contains nothing] The safe is empty! What a waste of a day![end if] You see a rack. The rack is standard.[if there is something on the s_2] On the rack you can see [a list of things on the s_2]. It doesn't get more TextWorld than this![end if][if there is nothing on the s_2] But the thing hasn't got anything on it. What, you think everything in TextWorld should have stuff on it?[end if] Oh wow! Is that what I think it is? It is! It's a counter. [if there is something on the s_3]On the counter you can make out [a list of things on the s_3].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_3]The counter appears to be empty. Oh! Why couldn't there just be stuff on it?[end if]

There is an unguarded exit to the east. There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unguarded.

infos.name: bathroom
infos.desc:
You've just shown up in a bathroom.



There is an unguarded exit to the west.

infos.name: studio
infos.desc:
You arrive in a studio. You decide to just list off a complete list of everything you see in the room, because hey, why not?



You need an unblocked exit? You should try going east. There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unblocked. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unblocked.

infos.name: cookhouse
infos.desc:
You've entered a cookhouse. You begin to take stock of what's in the room.

 Hey, want to see a plate? Look over there, a plate. The plate is ordinary.[if there is something on the s_4] On the plate you see [a list of things on the s_4].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_4] But the thing is empty.[end if] You make out a shelf. Wow, isn't TextWorld just the best? [if there is something on the s_5]On the shelf you can make out [a list of things on the s_5].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_5]The shelf appears to be empty. You think about smashing the shelf to bits, throwing the bits into the garbage, etc, until you get bored.[end if]

 There is [if d_0 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] type E door leading east. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going north. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unblocked.

infos.name: sauna
infos.desc:
Ah, the sauna. This is some kind of sauna, really great standard vibes in this place, a wonderful standard atmosphere.



You need an unblocked exit? You should try going east. There is an unblocked exit to the north. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going south. You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unguarded.

infos.name: cubicle
infos.desc:
You are in a cubicle. You begin to take stock of what's here.



There is an unblocked exit to the east. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going north. There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unblocked.

infos.name: bedroom
infos.desc:
Well, here we are in a bedroom.



There is an unguarded exit to the east. There is an unblocked exit to the west.

infos.name: washroom
infos.desc:
You make another one of your grand eccentric entrances into a washroom. Let's see what's in here.



You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unguarded. There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unguarded. You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unblocked.

infos.name: restroom
infos.desc:
Look at you, bigshot, walking into a restroom like it isn't some huge deal.

 You make out a board. The board is ordinary.[if there is something on the s_6] On the board you can make out [a list of things on the s_6].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_6] But the thing hasn't got anything on it. You move on, clearly infuriated by your TextWorld experience.[end if]

You need an unblocked exit? You should try going east. There is an unguarded exit to the north. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going west.

infos.name: dish-pit
infos.desc:
You arrive in a dish-pit. A standard one.

 As if things weren't amazing enough already, you can even see a freezer.[if c_8 is open and there is something in the c_8] The freezer contains [a list of things in the c_8].[end if][if c_8 is open and the c_8 contains nothing] The freezer is empty! What a waste of a day![end if] You can make out [if c_9 is locked]a locked[else if c_9 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] type X chest.[if c_9 is open and there is something in the c_9] The type X chest contains [a list of things in the c_9].[end if][if c_9 is open and the c_9 contains nothing] The type X chest is empty! This is the worst thing that could possibly happen, ever![end if]

There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unguarded. There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unblocked.

infos.name: canteen
infos.desc:
You've entered a canteen.

 You make out a box.[if c_10 is open and there is something in the c_10] The box contains [a list of things in the c_10].[end if][if c_10 is open and the c_10 contains nothing] The box is empty! This is the worst thing that could possibly happen, ever![end if]

There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unguarded.

objective: Hey, thanks for coming over to the TextWorld today, there is something I need you to do for me. First off, if it's not too much trouble, I need you to go to the south. Once you get through with that, take a trip east. If you can get around to doing that, make absolutely sure that the dresser is shut. That's it!
